Description

ðŸŒŽ REDUCE PLASTIC POLLUTION WHILE SHOPPING ONLINE ðŸŒŽ

ZeLoop Impact gets 30,000+ stores to support your favorite plastic clean-up charity, at no extra cost, when you shop online! You can instantly help remove plastic from polluted environments by supporting one of our great causes.

ðŸŒŽ SAVE MONEY WITH AUTOMATIC DISCOUNTS ðŸŒŽ

ZeLoop Impact also saves you time and money by testing all available discount codes, when you reach the checkout page, and automatically applying the one that saves you the most money. This way you can save money â€“ and support your favorite plastic clean-up charity for free!

ðŸŒŽ HOW IT WORKS ðŸŒŽ

Just shop online as you normally would. When you reach a partner website, youâ€™ll activate ZeLoop Impact with one click. This triggers the partner store to contribute part of your purchase price to the plastic clean-up charity of your choice.

There are also opportunities to earn support for your cause without even making a purchase â€“ such as registering for a free trial. Look for a summary of each partnerâ€™s offer terms by clicking the extension icon while on their website.

ðŸŒŽ YOUR PRIVACY IS IMPORTANT ðŸŒŽ

The ZeLoop Impact extension does not collect any of your personal information or payment details. It does not view your emails or record your searches. Also, we never sell your data to advertisers or other third parties.

ðŸŒŽ YOUR IMPACT ðŸŒŽ

By using this extension, you will help reduce plastic pollution. The money we earn from this system goes directly towards the plastic clean-up charity of your choice (https://impact.zeloop.net/projects). We retain part of the revenue to build and maintain our free tools.

To keep track of your impact, create a free ZeLoop Impact account and sign into your account through the extension. This way your activity will be recorded to your account, and you will receive email notifications of you impact.

ðŸŒŽ WHO WE ARE ðŸŒŽ

ZeLoop is a green-tech company that builds free tools to help individuals reduce plastic pollution. This free browser extension helps us raise money to support our plastic clean-up projects.

ðŸŒŽ REQUIRED PERMISSIONS ðŸŒŽ

"Read and change all your data on the websites you visit" so that our extension can automatically recognize when you visit a partner website and apply discount codes for you.

By clicking "Add to Chrome" I accept and agree to installing the ZeLoop Impact extension and the Privacy Policy (https://impact.zeloop.net/privacy) and Terms of Service (https://impact.zeloop.net/terms)
